originalText.text: I switched from another dentist to Dr Margariti because my last dentist destroyed my gums while cleaning. My experience at this dentist was fantastic. Everyone is was friendly. The office is nice and clean, with classical music playing and art hung on the walls. The cleaning was quick and pain-free. No complaints! I highly recommend this dentist!

text.text: I switched from another dentist to Dr Margariti because my last dentist destroyed my gums while cleaning. My experience at this dentist was fantastic. Everyone is was friendly. The office is nice and clean, with classical music playing and art hung on the walls. The cleaning was quick and pain-free. No complaints! I highly recommend this dentist!

originalText.text: I have given Dr Margariti about 4 times now to prove me wrong in my opinion. I have gone for cleanings that are more painful than any dentist I have been to (I’m am 27 with healthy teeth). I also went for a filling and it was incredibly painful. I have had root canals, crowns placed in, gum grafting. She did not show any care when I told her I was in pain and could use Novocaine. And if you would like a place with assistants and a dentist with bedside manners, don’t come here.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Margariti's for over ten years and she is a fabulous dentist. I briefly went to a different dentist for insurance reasons who was going to charge me $2500 to fill 8 "micro-cavities" - went back to Dr. Margariti and she told me I needed no such procedures and I have been totally fine!! I will only come here now - even if it means paying out of pocket!

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Margariti's for over ten years and she is a fabulous dentist. originalText.text: I live in NC and would see Dr. Magariti when I was visiting my family in Brooklyn.  She was by far the best dentist I have ever seen in my 60 years of seeing dentist. I had no idea that the dental work that I had done in the past should not have hurt and she did many of the same procedures and I was pain-free during and after the procedures. Her staff were always kind and courteous. When she moved from Brooklyn to Manhattan I was very sad. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a great, pain free dentist.

originalText.text: Outstanding service i felt like I owed this review to Dr.Margariti and her staff. I have never had a dentist that was so professional and attentive. They don’t make you wait, her place is super clean, and she really knows what she is doing. I’m glad I found her. I feel as though I’ve found a gem.
